instruction: Please help me write a poem for my valentine. I have been married to her for 20 years and I love her very much!
output:
My dearest love,

As I sit here and think of you,
My heart fills with love and devotion true.
Twenty years have passed, and yet,
Our love is as strong as the day we met.

You are my rock, my shelter, my home,
The one I run to when life gets me down.
You are my best friend, my partner in crime,
The one who makes my heart sing.

You are the sunshine in my day,
The star that guides me through the night.
You are the reason I wake up with a smile,
The one who makes my life so right.

So here's to twenty years of love,
Of laughter, tears, and everything in between.
Here's to many more years of happiness,
And a love that will always be true and clean.

Happy Valentine's Day, my dearest love,
You are the best thing that has ever happened to me.
I love you more than words can say,
And I will always be yours, now and forever.

The end.
